website_summaries.verdict: Although these dehydrated strips of 100% white fish are too big for cats to eat without a little help, the delicious and omega-3 loaded strips will always grab your kitten’s attention.
pros: Dehydrated white fish is the only ingredient
Great for pets with common food allergies
Strong odor attracts cats and dogs
cons: You will absolutely need to break down these large jerky-like fish treats

website_summaries.verdict: A low-calorie way to spoil your cat on special occasions or as training reward.
pros: Single ingredient white fish treats are a tasty low-calorie option to spoil your cat
Dehydrated fish pieces have the skin left on
Large treats can be easily broken up for smaller cats
Strong fish scent will pique your cat’s interest
cons: You receive a limited amount of treats for the price

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: For one, the fish smell is pretty strong. But most important, I was excited to give this to my English bulldog based on reviews. I gave her one and later I noticed her licking like she had peanut butter on the roof of her mouth. I didn’t think much of it until my wife went to clean her tough. A large piece was stuck in her throat!!!!!! I was able to get it out but it scared the crap out of me. I will never ever recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Mastria

customer_reviews.title: SUPER YUMMY, BICHON Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My picky 8 year old Bichon loves these crunchy fish snacks. I use them to add flavor to his kibble. Plus, they are "white" in color, no additives to activate the red eye goop he gets from other snacks. Why do I like these all natural fish filets? Human grade nutrition, NOT made in China, Not smelly, easy to break in pieces, great for travel, and of course because he loves them! If you own a white dog who has food sensitivities and has a tendency to get tear stains, try this awesome dog treat from The Honest Kitchen. Watch my video, that is Oliver at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Linda LeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Mother of God, the STENCH
customer_reviews.text: These things stink like a diaper pail full of cloth diapers marinated in week-old urine. My dog liked it, but I found it a bridge too far. Sticking to Zuke’s Minis Salmon Flavor. They stink too, but these fillets are in a class of their own. Lol, every time I passed the bag the scent of ammonia came wafting out. Dogs may love these - they love all kinds of gross things, but I couldn’t live with them in my tiny apartment.
customer_reviews.author: TheBanshee

customer_reviews.title: Not for cats
customer_reviews.text: Cat's loved the smell but we found these very hard and brittle. VERY hard to break into pieces even small enough to give to a cat as a treat and we had concerns about the jagged edges when they were broken. They seem like they could easily cut the mouth or throat and also become a choking hazard because they are so dry. Wouldn't give them to our cats, and will not buy again. Very expensive mistake as we also found that despite that none had actually been eaten - we could not return them. Nearly $ 10.00 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: BookSeller

customer_reviews.title: Great treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs go nuts over this!!! Never knew dogs likes fish but good grief they do! All 3 want this. It does smell so I suggest keeping the bag in a sealed container. I just wish they offered a bigger bag. If you find this review helpful please vote click helpful below. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Owens

customer_reviews.title: Horrific stench
customer_reviews.text: I bought these treats, put the bag on my stairs, and went to take a shower. While in the shower, I began to smell the horrible stink of old fish. The cat had ripped open the bag. He couldn’t eat the big pieces, but just leaving the bag open, the stink filled the house. I put the treats into a plastic bag, sealed it and threw it out. The stink came through the plastic. I had to leave it outdoors, away from the house.
customer_reviews.author: sylverroses

customer_reviews.title: Great one ingredient treat for your fur baby!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are one ingredient treats for your fur babies. Fish only!! So it does smell. If you have a patio or lanai for him to chew it on so you don’t have to smell it? I find it to be a great healthy alternative to many other treats for my puppy. He loves them!!’mmm
customer_reviews.author: AuntSheShe

customer_reviews.title: They're not using fresh fish.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement for the mussels they used to sell, but I can't find anywhere. I had a high opinion of this brand before I got these. The fish smelled strongly of ammonia. I had to throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Dogs LOVE these treats
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Honest Kitchen for my pets for 6 years now and they love their fish treats. Wish is wasn't so pricey cause I would buy them more often.
customer_reviews.author: JaniceH

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA * Easy to Break Into Pieces * Puppy is a Big Fan
customer_reviews.text: Does your dog like fish? If the answer is yes, give these a try. Our puppy is allergic to almost everything except fish, elk antlers, and certain vegetables & fruits so treats are tough. She devours these. I like that they are made in the USA and that I can give her something I know she can safely eat.
customer_reviews.author: Vegan Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: my cat is so in love with these treats. I love that you can tell by sight and smell that they're really high quality and a piece of actual fish, rather than maybe-possibly fish like you get with most treats. They're really easy to break so I can snap off little corner for my cat instead of needing to give her a whole huge piece. I fully intend to use only The Honest Kitchen for cat treats in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Oakeson

customer_reviews.title: Not for A Weak Stomach
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package and had to toss it to my husband as I started to gag. He was not to happy with the smell either but he managed to feed a couple of the treats to our dog and cats. They all loved the treat. Too bad I can’t give it to them. My husband has to hand them out first thing in the morning on an empty stomach. If you have a weak stomach these are not for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: dkk

customer_reviews.title: Smell Nasty, but dogs are obsessed
customer_reviews.text: My two pits love fish & fish flavored items. These are not long chews by no means, but they definitely are a treat the drool over. These are not many in the package, a little pricey in my opinion but the quality of the ingredients speaks for the price. Will be adding these to my subscribe & save . I would recommend these for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product - very fishy smell
customer_reviews.text: I learned that these are fillets which is the way the product is marketed. It breaks apart easily and rehydrates well. I keep it in its own bag as well as a Ziploc bag. My dog does enjoy the product.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them. They have a sting scent and really get her attention so they are great for breaking into tiny pieces to use for training attention & incentive. They are a bit pricey so I may purchase them less frequently
customer_reviews.author: L Brown

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these. They always magically appear when the treat ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these. They always magically appear when the treat bag gets rustled around. They last for a long time as well, I just break off about 3 small pieces per cat every day (I have 4 cats). It's been about a month and I still have about half a bag left. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these.
customer_reviews.text: It smells bad but the dog thinks it is euphoric! He loves these. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Myzenbox

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients but none of my animals will eat it!
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Ingredient list looks great! Con: None of my animals will eat this.. I have tried giving it to both my old cat, my young cat and my dog. I am shocked because both my young cat and dog will eat anything and everything yet, no takers on this.. so I have a full bag at my house going to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not really for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like them but they come in a rectangle about 5” by 2” so I need to break them for my small dogs. They do not break very well. Also my dogs prefer Plato brand better
customer_reviews.author: QKAgirl

customer_reviews.title: Healthy fish treat!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. They have a strong fishy smell but it’s one of her favorite treats.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Product is definitely healthy
customer_reviews.text: Dog thoroughly looks forward to receiving this as a treat. Turns his nose up at others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelmingly Fishy Smell
customer_reviews.text: Talk about smelly! My dog who hasn’t met a vile smell she didn’t want to roll in, couldn’t get away from these fast enough. Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EMF999

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love it, and it's healthy. A little pricey for the size, but that doesn't stop me from repurchasing many times.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great wholesome treat
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really enjoyed this. I thought maybe my cat would enjoy this as well and she didnt like the tiny piece I broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Scelluet

customer_reviews.title: Just try it
customer_reviews.text: Might be a little expensive and definitely has a strong fish smell, but I chunk weekly and my dogs coat remains shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these, but the smell is awful - you can tell it's definitely fish! I break them into tiny pieces for my cats, because the one was just licking the strip to death when I left the strip whole.
customer_reviews.author: Diane W.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic treat for 🐱🐶
customer_reviews.text: Both cat and dog love this treat!! Of course it is fishy, thank goodness! 💯 dehydrated fish. High quality treat, not cheap but natural and wild caught. Pricey, but my spoiled pets deserve the best.
customer_reviews.author: Yumi

customer_reviews.title: Smells so bad!
customer_reviews.text: Will make you gag! Smell so bad! Not the sellers fault, but had to throw them away and couldn’t get smell out of my house fast enough!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fishy smell
customer_reviews.text: They do have a strong fish odor and may have to toss them in the food processor since they are hard for cats.I do use other products by The Honest Kitchen that my cat loves.
customer_reviews.author: SomGal

customer_reviews.title: my Dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! my dog loved them! They smell like Fish Because they are fish!
customer_reviews.author: San Berdo mountain man

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs that love fish and this is the perfect treat for them. They love these.
customer_reviews.author: BellaandLolly

customer_reviews.title: Good fish jerky treat
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were like the fish skin treats so was surprised to see they were a fish jerky treat. Dogs still loved them though. Easy to break up.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Aylward

customer_reviews.title: Stinky!!!
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies love these but boy are they stinky!!
customer_reviews.author: Randy & Bethe

customer_reviews.title: This 13 year old Beagle love the Fish Fillets
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the Grandpuppy at Christmas. This 13 year old Beagle love the Fish Fillets!
customer_reviews.author: C M

customer_reviews.title: Love this but, boy, is it stinky! (Probably why my cats love it)!
customer_reviews.text: Cats love this but I can't stand the smell! Tip: Keep it double ziploc bagged to reduce the odor! Love that this is an all natural product to keep my kitties healthy!
customer_reviews.author: EMPOWERED GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them. I do not!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. They are his "special" treat because I can't stand to handle them they smell so badly!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Quality Treat
customer_reviews.text: My girl loves them! She is very motivated and they are easy to break for training. I also love that they are one ingredient- fish!
customer_reviews.author: Be Razz

customer_reviews.title: rotten smell
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat buyer of these. This time I opened the package and it was a rancid smell. What a shame, that for 12 bucks I have to throw them away
customer_reviews.author: Brandy curran

customer_reviews.title: I love this company Honest Kitchen!!
customer_reviews.text: Great company for sure!!! I buy many products from The Honest Kitchen,....they absolutely have the best line of products around!
customer_reviews.author: DogsRule

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my yorkie
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot from honest kitchen, but these didn’t work for my yorkie. She’s sensitive and so that’s why I buy honest kitchen and usually she does well, but these made her sick.
customer_reviews.author: Bella G.

customer_reviews.title: They stink soooo bad. Very fishy smell, lol
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how much they loved these treats. Wish I could get them from the store instead of ordering everytime.
customer_reviews.author: deborah couillard

customer_reviews.title: Just yell fish and the dog comes running!
customer_reviews.text: These are a little thick and very crunchy, dog loves them. I just break off a piece and seal the zipper bag back up to stay fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy n Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Honest Kitchen  Wishes Filets
customer_reviews.text: Our pets really love these filets. all natural. Recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: High quality dog treats
customer_reviews.text: Our little picky dog loves these treats. They smell pretty bad but she absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. Safe and healthy; no adverse reaction after giving many times.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Vanlaarhoven

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES it!!! Simple, dehydrated ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES it!!! Simple, dehydrated white fish, nothing else!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tomosawa

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. Nothing bad in them for pets.
customer_reviews.author: luvdragons

customer_reviews.title: X
customer_reviews.text: My dog liked them, but SUPER stinky. The mussels were much better
customer_reviews.author: chefmikek1

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: My dog is enamored. She’s now a pescatarian. These are real fish and they very truly smell like it.
customer_reviews.author: Stoptillyoushop

customer_reviews.title: My dogs gobble these up!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these! They are stinky, but it's worth it since my dogs like them so much.
customer_reviews.author: TS - Dallas

customer_reviews.title: great but smell terrible
customer_reviews.text: These are great but they smell bad. My dog loves them but they hurt her stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Prangy

product_meta.title: The Honest Kitchen Wishes: Natural Human Grade Dehydrated Fish Filets, Treats for Dogs and Cats 3 oz
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1Wishes ­filets are light, crispy and perfectly snapable so you can use tiny morsels for smaller mouths. Dogs and cats love the taste, and you'll love that they're made with wild caught fish loaded with protein and Omega-3s. A treat both dogs and cats agree on—wishes do come true!.
feature_bullets: JUST ONE INGREDIENT: wild-caught haddock skin
FISH is an excellent treat for dogs who have sensitivities to more common protein sources
HIGH IN PROTEIN, low in calories
